version_description: Minor enhancements and bug fixes

New in this version:
-  Your Favorites now sync across devices! If you use the same Facebook or Twitter connected to your Glympse account on more than one device, your Favorites will automatically appear on all your devices.
-  Our Start Menu now has your top three Favorites, so you can send to them quickly! Pick your top three by sorting them on the Favorites page.
- Updating a Favorite now also updates the matching Home Screen Shortcut.
- Adding or Updating a Favorite and saving to your Home Screen is now easier. 
- Now when your Glympse is close to expiring and you haven't yet reached your destination, you can extend right from the notification.
- Other minor fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using Glympse!

Glympse now shows on Jaguar InControl Apps, Land Rover InControl Apps, and BOSCH mySPIN.
Bug fixes.
Minor enhancements and bug fixes.

* Ford Sync 3 Support 
* 64 Bit Support 
* Bug Fixes

* BMW 2016 Vehicle Support
* Bug Fixes

* 3D Touch Quick Actions for favorites.
* Enhancements and bug fixes.

* 3D Touch Quick Actions for favorites.
* Enhancements and bug fixes.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

Release Notes:
* Following a Glympse link launches directly into Glympse app (IOS 9 and newer)
* Update for Ford Sync
* Minor enhancements and bug fixes

* Better layout when OS is set to larger fonts
* Improved location reliability
* Better support for landscape orientation
* New destination picker

* Better layout when OS is set to larger fonts
* Improved location reliability
* Better support for landscape orientation
* New destination picker

version_name: von Glympse heruntergeladen haben.Um iMessage zu nutzen

version_description:
Improvements to the Glympse Jaguar and Land Rover experience.
Glympse public Tag experience enhancements.
Minor improvements to support larger font.

Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
New iMessage extension and our long awaited Apple Watch App now included with Glympse! 
Make sure you have downloaded the latest version of Glympse.
To use iMessage, select a conversation and tap the App Store icon to expose available app extensions. If you don’t see Glympse in your available apps, make sure it is switched on by selecting ‘Store’ and then the ‘Manage’ tab. Once you launch the Glympse extension you may need to enable permissions for location sharing. 
To use our Apple Watch app, you will need to have recent contacts or favorites in your main Glympse app for easy sending.

version_name: beinhaltet eine Vorschau auf unsere neue Funktion Private Gruppen

version_description:
Fix to persist the "Expire on arrival" setting
General bug fixes

New Glympse Private Groups: This release includes a preview of our new private groups feature that allows you to set up an invite-only based group in which all members can see each other on a single map. For instance, set up your family group, and make it easy to keep in touch with your family members with a single share or request to everyone at once! Simply create a new group by adding members, naming the group and sending! 
Note: All users of private groups must verify their phone numbers for additional security.

Phone number verification: Now verify and link your phone number to your Glympse profile and use across all your devices.
Minor enhancements and bug fixes

Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Private Groups - Who’s Viewing?  Now you can see which members are actively viewing the group. 
Glympse for iMessage, now with the ability to add a destination for predictive route and real-time ETA for your journey.

Extension sharing setting ("Allow share from extension") is now set to off by default.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

Location Services Access can be set to 'While using the App' (Note: Glympse extensions like iMessage or Apple Watch requires that you set this to 'Always'.
WhatsApp Integration: You can now send a Glympse via WhatsApp!
My Places: Add your Home and Work address.
Add an address (destination) to a Location Request: perfect for a meetup, pick-ups, or simple to request ETA to a place
Bug fixes and minor enhancements

Send location up to 12 hours (previously 4 hours)
Show ETA on map when viewing a Glympse
Bug fixes and minor enhancements

We’re making your location sharing experience smarter:
-Specify your mode of transportation (Car, Bike, or Walking) to increase accuracy of arrival times
-Enter your destination and we’ll auto set your share duration based on your estimated arrival time
-We’ve also made improvements to performance and stability

We’ve added new options and capabilities for registered user accounts and private groups.
• Sign up for a Glympse user account right from the first-time setup screen.
• Registered users can create and use private groups, save account details and sign in on multiple devices. As always, user accounts are optional and never required to use Glympse.
• Users can choose private groups from the recipient picker.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements
Bug fixes and minor enhancements

Support for iOS 11
Support for iPhone X
Smart Device Link update

Quickly share your location with contacts via any app on your device that can be invoked through the native iOS Share menu - WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Snapchat, GroupMe, Slack, etc.
Select OS Share as the recipient of your Glympse and share location. Next, choose your preferred messaging app for fast, easy sharing. We’ll bring you back to the Glympse app automatically.

Bug fixes and minor enhancements
Privacy updates related to GDPR

Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Privacy updates related to GDPR

Big update with a power savings feature, security enhancement, and more!
-Enable Low Power Mode in settings to save battery life when your Glympse isn’t being actively viewed.
-For enhanced security, select Delete After Sharing Ends to delete the history of a sent Glympse.
-My current location - Sending a request to someone will allow you to quickly add your current location with a single tap. 
-Navigation provider preference - Select your preferred routing app in the settings allows you to pass the address of your intended destination to your favorite navigation app.
-Now including Dark Mode!
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

-Now including Dark Mode!
